column5: HELLO AGAIN  I am looking for the proper chanell for WILD TV.  Its suppose to be a new station for 24hr fishing and hunting shows.....    I use to have it for bell sat. but I have switched to roger and can not find it anywhere..  If you know please tell me, it was a great station  DAve
You should find your answer here...  http://www.wildtv.ca/howtoget.html  Maureen

I know that Rogers in Toronto does not carry it. They do carry videos on demand but you have to pay to watch them and there's only a couple to choose from that have been on the list forever. So your probably out of luck. Go back to expressvu.
I am in Burlington adn Cogeco carries it... it is 119 on cogeco and they also have WFN on 120...
thanks guys for the info.....  called rogers and complained and they sid that they are adding to the list  DAVE
I HAVE ...WFN...THE ONE AND ONLY... THE WORLD FISHING NETWORK   ITS THE ONLY STATION THAT MATTERS...AND ITS ON ROGERS CABLE           OH YA AND ITS GREAT   CHEERS
Hey dmasse, did Rogers say when they expect this to happen?

wELL WFN is great i agree, but there are shows on WILD TV that they do not show.   I also like the hunting side of the great outdoors....  Rogers said in the next couple week, they should be adding it to the package..  dave
